title: When The Gates Are Open Wide
lyrics:
When the gates are open wide
I will sit by Jesus'slde,
l'm gonna sing, I'm gonna shout
Praise the Lord,
l'm gonna walk
All around God's Heaven,"
And meet my loved ones
Who's gone before,
l'm gonna sit by the sides of the river,
Until we meet to part no more.
In my Father's house
There are many mansions there,
